reviewText: I would agree with Coach Lou Holtz that Randy Moss may be the best high school ever, that in spite of an imperfect environment growing up.  Although somewhat saddened to see some of Randy's troubles, I was glad the film did not hide the truth.  Many may blame Randy for his troubles, but others at Dupont High and in the town of Rand may be the real culprits.  Randy, we're proud to say you are from West Virginia.
